message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $85 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm willing to compromise and sell the product to you for $92.
I understand your compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $88 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $91.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'll make one more offer: $87 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I understand that you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'll make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $89.
I appreciate your final compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'll make one last offer: $86 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I understand that you're really close to your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $90. I think that's a fair price considering the value of the product.

I understand your position, Alice, but I'm really close to my budget. I'm willing to make one last offer: $89 for the product. If you're not willing to accept this, I'll have to consider buying from John for $120.
